Interface Board

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleBoard
public interface Board
Represents the game board, defining the contract for all game board implementations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ClearRow
    clearRows()
    Clears any completed rows from the board.
    boolean
    createNewBrick()
    Creates a new brick and places it on the board.
    int[][]
    getBoardMatrix()
    Gets the current state of the board as a 2D integer matrix.
    Score
    getScore()
    Gets the current score.
    ViewData
    getViewData()
    Gets the data required for the view to render the game state.
    void
    holdCurrentBrick()
    Holds the current brick, allowing the player to use it later.
    BrickType
    mergeBrickToBackground()
    Merges the current brick into the board's background.
    boolean
    moveBrickDown()
    Moves the current brick one step down.
    boolean
    moveBrickLeft()
    Moves the current brick one step to the left.
    boolean
    moveBrickRight()
    Moves the current brick one step to the right.
    void
    newGame()
    Starts a new game, resetting the board and score.
    boolean
    rotateLeftBrick()
    Rotates the current brick to the left.

  • Method Details

    • moveBrickDown

      boolean moveBrickDown()
      Moves the current brick one step down.
      Returns:
      true if the brick was moved, false otherwise.

    • moveBrickLeft

      boolean moveBrickLeft()
      Moves the current brick one step to the left.
      Returns:
      true if the brick was moved, false otherwise.

    • moveBrickRight

      boolean moveBrickRight()
      Moves the current brick one step to the right.
      Returns:
      true if the brick was moved, false otherwise.

    • rotateLeftBrick

      boolean rotateLeftBrick()
      Rotates the current brick to the left.
      Returns:
      true if the brick was rotated, false otherwise.

    • createNewBrick

      boolean createNewBrick()
      Creates a new brick and places it on the board.
      Returns:
      true if the new brick intersects with the existing board, indicating a game over.

    • holdCurrentBrick

      void holdCurrentBrick()
      Holds the current brick, allowing the player to use it later.

    • getBoardMatrix

      int[][] getBoardMatrix()
      Gets the current state of the board as a 2D integer matrix.
      Returns:
      the board matrix.

    • getViewData

      ViewData getViewData()
      Gets the data required for the view to render the game state.
      Returns:
      the view data.

    • mergeBrickToBackground

      BrickType mergeBrickToBackground()
      Merges the current brick into the board's background.
      Returns:
      the type of the merged brick.

    • clearRows

      ClearRow clearRows()
      Clears any completed rows from the board.
      Returns:
      a ClearRow object containing information about the cleared rows.

    • getScore

      Score getScore()
      Gets the current score.
      Returns:
      the score object.

    • newGame

      void newGame()
      Starts a new game, resetting the board and score.
